org.name: ACRE
org.heroSubtitle: Real competitions, real projects, real connections — experiences that count

why.title: Access to Pros You Can’t Reach Alone
why.body: Small-group networking with young professionals, alumni, and guest speakers (finance, real estate, startups).

why.title: Competition Credentials
why.body: Prep and participate in Wharton Global (Sep–Dec), JA Titan, and Shark-Tank style events with résumé-ready recognition.

why.title: Project-Based Value
why.body: Build real stock theses, pitch decks, and basic real-estate underwriting models you can showcase.

why.title: Publishing & Recognition
why.body: Write for the Acre Report and get featured on LinkedIn for a public footprint.

why.title: Chapters & Leadership
why.body: Open new chapters, reshape the exec board, and level up leadership experience.

programs.name: Acre Forum (Speakers)
programs.desc: Occasional guest speakers with small-group Q&A — real paths, real advice.

programs.name: Acre Lab (Workshops)
programs.desc: Hands-on sessions: stock fundamentals, valuation basics, options intro, real-estate underwriting 101.

programs.name: Acre Prep (Competitions)
programs.desc: Train and register teams for Wharton Global and JA Titan; research → thesis → deck → compete.

programs.name: Acre Pitch
programs.desc: Shark-Tank style showcase with judges, feedback, and prizes — portfolio-ready output.

programs.name: Acre Report (Newsletter)
programs.desc: Monthly highlights, member articles, and event drops; amplify on LinkedIn, Reddit, and Discord.

events.title: Launch Meeting
events.meta: Financial literacy slides + a space to play Monopoly in peace; announce comp timelines & speaker dates.

events.title: Wharton Global Investment Competition
events.meta: Prep and participate; checkpoints for research, thesis, and deck reviews.

events.title: Guest Speakers & Internships
events.meta: Young pros + alumni, and rolling internship opportunities via partners.

newsletter.blurb: Monthly highlights, member articles, and event drops. Add your email to get the next issue (and LinkedIn shoutouts).
